sentence: On Friday, Zendesk ( ZEN ) received a positive adjustment to its Relative Strength ( RS ) Rating , from 77 to 88.
[ibd-display-video id=2102289 width=50 float=left autostart=true] This exclusive rating from Investor's Business Daily identifies market leadership with a 1 (worst) to 99 (best) score.
The rating shows how a stock's price behavior over the trailing 52 weeks holds up against all the other stocks in our database.
Over 100 years of market history reveals that the market's biggest winners tend to have an RS Rating of above 80 in the early stages of their moves.
